thread.title: Kim Kardashian Says She Likes the Name 'Easton' for Baby No. 2
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Says She Likes the Name 'Easton' for Baby No. 2

author: Joi-Marie McKenzie
title: Kim Kardashian Says She Likes the Name 'Easton' for Baby No. 2
text:
Share Article 
Charles Sykes/Bravo (LOS ANGELES) -- Kim Kardashian revealed Wednesday that she doesn't start thinking of potential baby names until her eighth month of pregnancy. And although the mom-to-be has a month to go, she did tell daytime talk show host Ellen DeGeneres which name she really likes for her future son. 
"I do like the name Easton...Easton West," she admitted on The Ellen DeGeneres Show . " I don't think my husband likes that name, but I do like it." 
The baby boy, who reportedly is due on Christmas Day, will be the second child for the reality star and husband, Kanye West. They are already parents to 2-year-old North. 
Kardashian also said she knows one name that won't make the cut. "I don’t think we'll go another direction. It's definitely not South," she said. "Every time someone says South, I just want to roll my eyes. ...It's not a good direction." 
And although Kardashian has been open about her struggle to have a second child, she said a psychic told her that "'You’re going to have twins in 2018.'" 
Kardashian said she told the woman, "'Lose my email. No I’m not!'" 
  Thursday, October 1, 2015 at 7:01AM by
